name: Tinker Toss
description:
Help BitBot on his journey to escape the dregs of machine society, the junkyard. Send him soaring on his way back to the center of civilized robot society, Droidopolis. 

•   Toss BitBot sky high using a slingshot engineered out of                     junkyard waste. •   Gather scrap as BitBot hurdles towards Droidopolis which                 can be spent on new parts for BitBot. •   Use the Bot Builder to outfit Bit Bot with new parts.
